div.div: It is the mission of Benson Schools to provide a safe and welcoming learning community that prepares students to be competitive and productive citizens.

div.span: Welcome to Benson Unified School District

img.alt: Welcome to Benson Unified School District
img.div: In the Benson Unified School District, we believe education is a community effort. Parents, staff, students, and the community all play a critical role in the education of our children. These partnerships are the bedrock of our success and truly promote our district motto “Benson Schools – On Track for Tomorrow”. We believe that investing in our children today will enrich our community for the future. Thank you for joining us on this journey.

span.data-emptytext: Benson Unified School District provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment
span.data-value:
The Benson Unified School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion or disability.
This website is regularly reviewed and updated to ensure compliance with Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act. Any website accessibility concerns or suggestions may be brought to the attention of Lisa Benton, Communications Coordinator at lbenton@bensonsd.k12.az.us.

p.span:
The Benson Unified School District does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion or disability.
This website is regularly reviewed and updated to ensure compliance with Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act and Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act. Any website accessibility concerns or suggestions may be brought to the attention of Lisa Benton, Communications Coordinator at lbenton@bensonsd.k12.az.us.

p.a: Website Hosting Solution Powered by SchoolBlocks

div.h3:
Welcome to the SchoolBlocks
self-guided tour!
div.p: The most common question we receive is, how is SchoolBlocks inspired by Pinterest? SchoolBlocks eliminates navigation bars and uses a block style layout that’s similar to Pinterest. It creates a unique and engaging browsing experience, optimizes for mobile and removes a lot of navigational complexity.
Please click on the red plus signs found on this page to learn more about specific features.
As an administrator, you will have the custom page editing tools auto-load. Just click ‘read more’ to access our advanced page editing tools.
This bar holds all content types. Click on the Admin button, click "add block", select a content type, add your content then insert the block into the page.
This icon appears when you have edit permissions. Hold your mouse down and move the block. You’ll see the page reorganize!
Each block type has a custom editing experience. Click the pencil on any block or view our help documentation to learn more about block types.
